attributes.action: Abolish prescription charges on asthma medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tyroxine users do not have to pay prescription charges on their medication, due to it being deemed a "life saving drug".  Whilst I agree in part with this, I argue that steriod tablets & inhalers used in the treatment of Asthma can also be deemed "life saving" and should also be free.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
